bio: Hi! I'm Hinyeung (Dennis) Lam, a CS student at the University of Washington passionate about computer graphics, game development, and AI-driven interactivity. I love building visually engaging experiences—from mobile games to interactive classrooms—using Unity, Unreal, and modern web stacks.
interests: When I'm not coding, I'm designing game mechanics with my studio or exploring animation techniques to bring ideas to life.
